name: A Dungeon (Game made for Ludum Dare 48)
name_original: A Dungeon (Game made for Ludum Dare 48)
description:
Only xBox 360 Controller has been tested.  

X: short jump

A: Long jump

Left Joystick: Movement.

(you can also use space to jump when playing with keyboard)

In this game...

In this game you control a small miner, who has found a dungeon entrance, in the dungeon there may be some treasure, so are you going to find it?

There are 4 levels.

Note: everything in this game was made in under 24 hours.
